automation_engineer.title: Senior Test Automation Engineer (SDET)
automation_engineer.description: We are seeking a Senior SDET to lead our automation efforts. You will design, develop and maintain automated testing frameworks for our cloud-based platforms.
key_requirements: Expert knowledge of Playwright, Cypress or Selenium
Strong proficiency in TypeScript, Java or Python
Experience with CI/CD integration using GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps

qa_lead.title: QA Lead / Test Manager
qa_lead.description: Leading a cross-functional team of QA engineers to deliver high-quality software products. You will define the strategy and oversee the delivery.
key_requirements: Proven leadership experience in a QA environment
Expertise in Test Management tools (Jira, Zephyr)
Experience in defining risk-based testing strategies
Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
